name: Foster The Bleeples
description:
Foster The Bleeples is a Tamagotchi-like Idle game in which you foster a little guys called "Beeples" who are essential to the planets health.
Unfortunately, these guys require a lot of attention to be left alive, so fostering them is a big business.
You get paid for your efforts and can spend money on upgrades for your Beeple to keep him alive for as long as possible.

The Beeples are Alfonzo, Brian, and Gus, who each have their quirks.

Enjoy this game in the background of playing other games to see how long you can keep your Beeple alive.

This is our second Ludum Dare game together, this time made by 2 artists and 1 programmer. We hope you enjoy the game.
